mc.name: Altar of Dementia
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a creature: Target player puts a number of cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a creature: Target player puts a number of cards equal to that creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
mc.flavorText:
"It is not that you will go mad. It is that you will beg for madness."
--Volrath

mc.name: Booby Trap
mc.oracleText:
As Booby Trap comes into play, name a card other than a basic land card and choose an opponent.
The chosen player reveals each card he or she draws.
When the chosen player draws the named card, sacrifice Booby Trap. If you do, Booby Trap deals 10 damage to that player.
mc.printedText:
When Booby Trap comes into play, name a card other than a basic land.
Whenever target opponent draws any cards, he or she reveals those cards to all players. If any of those cards is the named card, Sacrifice Booby Trap and it deals 10 damage to that player.

mc.name: Bottle Gnomes
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: Gain 3 life.
mc.flavorText:
"I am reminded of the fable of the silver egg. Its owner cracks it open to see what jewels it holds, only to discover a simple yellow yolk."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Coiled Tinviper
mc.oracleText: First strike
mc.printedText: First strike
mc.flavorText: The bite of the tinviper feels most like a razor drawn across the tongue.

mc.name: Cold Storage
mc.oracleText:
{3}: Remove target creature you control from the game.
Sacrifice Cold Storage: Return each creature card removed from the game with Cold Storage to play under its owner's control.
mc.printedText:
{3}: Put target creature you control on Cold Storage.
Sacrifice Cold Storage: Put all creature cards on Cold Storage into play.

mc.name: Cursed Scroll
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Name a card. Reveal a card at random from your hand. If it's the named card, Cursed Scroll deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Name a card. Target opponent chooses a card at random from your hand. If he or she chooses the named card, Cursed Scroll deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Echo Chamber
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: An opponent chooses target creature he or she controls. Put a token into play as a copy of that creature. The token gains haste until end of turn. Remove the token from the game at end of turn. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}: Target opponent chooses target creature he or she controls. Put a token creature into play and treat it as a copy of that creature. The token creature is unaffected by summoning sickness this turn. At end of turn, remove the token creature from the game. Play this ability as a sorcery.

mc.name: Emerald Medallion
mc.oracleText: Green spells you play cost {1} less to play.
mc.printedText: Your green spells cost {1} less to play.

mc.name: Emmessi Tome
mc.oracleText: {5}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
mc.printedText: {5}, {T}: Draw two cards, then choose and discard a card.
mc.flavorText: It is like life and destiny: we think we know the story, but we have read only half the tale.

mc.name: Energizer
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Energizer.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Energizer.
mc.flavorText: Like a kettle set to boil, it must eventually go off--on someone.

mc.name: Essence Bottle
mc.oracleText:
{3}, {T}: Put an elixir counter on Essence Bottle.
{T}, Remove all elixir counters from Essence Bottle: You gain 2 life for each elixir counter removed this way.
mc.printedText:
{3}, {T}: Put an elixir counter on Essence Bottle.
{T}, Remove all elixir counters from Essence Bottle: Gain 2 life for each elixir counter removed in this way.

mc.name: Excavator
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice a basic land: Target creature gains landwalk of each of the land types of the sacrificed land until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice a basic land: Target creature gains that landwalk ability until end of turn. (If defending player controls any lands of that type, this creature is unblockable.)

mc.name: Flowstone Sculpture
mc.oracleText: {2}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Flowstone Sculpture or Flowstone Sculpture gains flying, first strike, or trample. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText: {2}, Choose and discard a card: Flowstone Sculpture gains flying, first strike, or trample permanently, or put a +1/+1 counter on Flowstone Sculpture.
mc.flavorText: The sculptor, weary of his work, created art that would finish itself.

mc.name: Fool's Tome
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Draw a card. Play this ability only if you have no cards in hand.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Draw a card. Use this ability only if you have no cards in your hand.
mc.flavorText:
Squee: "What's that?"
Ertai: "It's a magical book."
Squee: "Am I smart enough ta use it?"
Ertai: "You could say that."

mc.name: Grindstone
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Put the top two cards of target player's library into that player's graveyard. If both cards share a color, repeat this process.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Put the top two cards of target player's library into that player's graveyard. If both cards share at least one color, repeat this process.
mc.flavorText:
"Memory is a burden that wears at the soul as weather wears at stone."
--Crovax

mc.name: Helm of Possession
mc.oracleText:
You may choose not to untap Helm of Possession during your untap step.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Gain control of target creature as long as you control Helm of Possession and Helm of Possession remains tapped.
mc.printedText:
You may choose not to untap Helm of Possession during your untap phase.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Gain control of target creature as long as you control Helm of Possession and Helm of Possession remains tapped.

mc.name: Jet Medallion
mc.oracleText: Black spells you play cost {1} less to play.
mc.printedText: Your black spells cost {1} less to play.

mc.name: Jinxed Idol
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Jinxed Idol deals 2 damage to you.

Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Idol. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText:
During your upkeep, Jinxed Idol deals 2 damage to you.
Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Idol permanently.
mc.flavorText: "Here."

mc.name: Lotus Petal
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Play this ability as a mana source.
mc.flavorText: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."

mc.name: Magnetic Web
mc.oracleText:
If a creature with a magnet counter on it attacks, all creatures with magnet counters on them attack this turn if able.

Whenever a creature with a magnet counter on it attacks, all creatures with magnet counters on them block that creature this turn if able.

{1}, {T}: Put a magnet counter on target creature.
mc.printedText:
If any creature with any magnet counters on it attacks, all creatures with magnet counters on them that the attacking player controls attack if able.
If any creature with any magnet counters on it attacks, all creatures with magnet counters on them that the defending player controls block that creature if able.
{1}, {T}: Put a magnet counter on target creature.

mc.name: Manakin
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool. Play this ability as a mana source.
mc.flavorText: Hanna regarded Squee sternly. "Because it's not a toy, no matter how much it may look like one," she said, taking the manakin from him.

mc.name: Metallic Sliver
mc.printedText: Metallic Sliver counts as a Sliver.
mc.flavorText: When the clever counterfeit was accepted by the hive, Volrath's influence upon the slivers grew even stronger.

mc.name: Mogg Cannon
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains flying until end of turn. At end of turn, destroy that creature.
mc.flavorText: Moggs never volunteer for anything twice.

mc.name: Patchwork Gnomes
mc.oracleText: Discard a card: Regenerate Patchwork Gnomes.
mc.printedText: Choose and discard a card: Regenerate Patchwork Gnomes.
mc.flavorText:
"Just when I get them working, they always start fighting and tearing at each other for spare parts."
--Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

mc.name: Pearl Medallion
mc.oracleText: White spells you play cost {1} less to play.
mc.printedText: Your white spells cost {1} less to play.

mc.name: Phyrexian Grimoire
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: Target opponent chooses one of the top two cards in your graveyard. Remove that card from the game and put the other one into your hand.
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}: Target opponent chooses one of the top two cards in your graveyard. Remove that card from the game and put the other into your hand.
mc.flavorText: Every page cost a life; every secret cost a thousand more.

mc.name: Phyrexian Hulk
mc.flavorText:
"They are convenient in having no souls, but less so in having no spirit."
--Volrath

mc.name: Phyrexian Splicer
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Choose one - flying; first strike; shadow; or trample. Target creature with that ability loses it until end of turn and another target creature gains it until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Choose flying, first strike, trample, or shadow. Target creature with that ability loses it until end of turn. Another target creature gains that ability until end of turn.

mc.name: Puppet Strings
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Tap or untap target creature.
mc.flavorText: "Have no illusions," Volrath warned Greven, "about free will."

mc.name: Ruby Medallion
mc.oracleText: Red spells you play cost {1} less to play.
mc.printedText: Your red spells cost {1} less to play.

mc.name: Sapphire Medallion
mc.oracleText: Blue spells you play cost {1} less to play.
mc.printedText: Your blue spells cost {1} less to play.

mc.name: Scalding Tongs
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have three or fewer cards in hand, Scalding Tongs deals 1 damage to target opponent.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, if you have three or fewer cards in your hand, Scalding Tongs deals 1 damage to target opponent.
mc.flavorText:
"This has nothing to do with what you know and everything to do with what I wish."
--Volrath

mc.name: Scroll Rack
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}: Remove any number of cards in your hand from the game face down. Put that many cards from the top of your library into your hand. Then look at the removed cards and put them on top of your library in any order.
mc.printedText: {1}, {T}: Choose any number of cards in your hand and set those cards aside. Put an equal number of cards from the top of your library into your hand. Then put the cards set aside in this way on top of your library in any order.

mc.name: Squee's Toy
mc.oracleText: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Prevent 1 damage to any creature.
mc.flavorText: As the horrors closed in on Gerrard, Squee trembled and clutched his toy for comfort. He didn't know where it came from or why it was so warm, but he was glad he'd kept it near.

mc.name: Static Orb
mc.oracleText: If Static Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than two permanents during their untap steps.
mc.printedText: Players cannot untap more than two permanents during their untap phases.
mc.flavorText:
Time passes, time crawls;
Time doesn't move at all.

mc.name: Telethopter
mc.oracleText: Tap an untapped creature you control: Telethopter gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Tap a creature you control: Telethopter gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: After losing several of the devices to midair collisions, Greven forbade moggs from operating telethopters.

mc.name: Thumbscrews
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have five or more cards in hand, Thumbscrews deals 1 damage to target opponent.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, if you have five or more cards in your hand, Thumbscrews deals 1 damage to target opponent.
mc.flavorText:
"We will start small, I think."
--Volrath

mc.name: Torture Chamber
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a pain counter on Torture Chamber.
At the end of your turn, Torture Chamber deals damage to you equal to the number of pain counters on it.
{1}, {T}, Remove all pain counters from Torture Chamber: Torture Chamber deals damage to target creature equal to the number of pain counters removed this way.
mc.printedText:
During your upkeep, put a pain counter on Torture Chamber.
At the end of your turn, Torture Chamber deals 1 damage to you for each pain counter on it.
{1}, {T}, Remove all pain counters from Torture Chamber: Torture Chamber deals 1 damage for each pain counter on it to target creature.

mc.name: Watchdog
mc.oracleText:
Watchdog blocks each turn if able.
As long as Watchdog is untapped, all creatures attacking you get -1/-0.
mc.printedText:
Watchdog blocks if able.
As long as Watchdog is untapped, all creatures attacking you get -1/-0.
mc.flavorText: Its growl is a long, rumbling grind of gears and clockwork, its bark a blast of hissing steam.

mc.name: Abandon Hope
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Abandon Hope, discard X cards.
Look at target opponent's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.
mc.printedText: Choose and discard X cards: Look at target opponent's hand and choose X of those cards. That player discards the chosen cards.
mc.flavorText: As Gerrard's form vanished into the maw of trees, Hanna mouthed a silent plea, mourning a crushed dream.

mc.name: Ancient Tomb
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. Ancient Tomb deals 2 damage to you.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add two colorless mana to your mana pool. Ancient Tomb deals 2 damage to you.
mc.flavorText:
There is no glory to be gained in the kingdom of the dead.
--Vec tomb inscription

mc.name: Bellowing Fiend
mc.oracleText:
Flying

Whenever Bellowing Fiend deals damage to a creature, Bellowing Fiend deals 3 damage to that creature's controller and 3 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Bellowing Fiend damages any creature, Bellowing Fiend deals 3 damage to that creature's controller and 3 damage to you.

mc.name: Bounty Hunter
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Put a bounty counter on target nonblack creature.
{T}: Destroy target creature with a bounty counter on it.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Put a bounty counter on target nonblack creature.
{T}: Destroy target creature with any bounty counters on it.
mc.flavorText: "Once they've marked you," Starke said, "the world is made of glass."

mc.name: Carrionette
mc.oracleText: {2}{B}{B}: Remove Carrionette and target creature from the game unless that creature's controller pays {2}. Play this ability only if Carrionette is in your graveyard.
mc.printedText: {2}{B}{B}: Remove Carrionette and target creature from the game. That creature's controller may pay {2} to counter this ability. Use this ability only if Carrionette is in your graveyard.

mc.name: Clot Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Slivers have "{2}: Regenerate this permanent."
mc.printedText: Each Sliver gains "{2}: Regenerate this creature."
mc.flavorText:
"One would think I would be accustomed to unexpected returns."
--Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

mc.name: Coercion
mc.oracleText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
mc.printedText: Look at target opponent's hand and choose one of those cards. That player discards that card.
mc.flavorText:
"There's very little that escapes me, Greven. And you will escape very little if you fail."
--Volrath

mc.name: Coffin Queen
mc.oracleText:
You may choose not to untap Coffin Queen during your untap step.
{2}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from a graveyard into play under your control. When Coffin Queen becomes untapped or you lose control of Coffin Queen, remove that creature from the game.
mc.printedText:
You may choose not to untap Coffin Queen during your untap phase.
{2}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from any graveyard into play under your control. Remove that creature from the game if Coffin Queen becomes untapped or if you lose control of Coffin Queen.

mc.name: Commander Greven il-Vec
mc.oracleText:
Fear
When Commander Greven il-Vec comes into play, sacrifice a creature.
mc.printedText:
When Commander Greven il-Vec comes into play, sacrifice a creature.
Greven cannot be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures.
mc.flavorText:
"Rage is the only freedom left me."
--Greven il-Vec

mc.name: Corpse Dance
mc.oracleText:
Buyback {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Return the top creature card from your graveyard to play. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Remove the creature from the game at end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Buyback {2} (You may pay an additional {2} when you play this spell. If you do, put it into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Put the top creature card from your graveyard into play. That creature is unaffected by summoning sickness this turn. Remove the creature from the game at end of turn.

mc.name: Dark Banishing
mc.oracleText: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy target nonblack creature. That creature cannot be regenerated this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"It is the way of most wizards to begin by exiling themselves and to end by exiling everyone else."
--Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

mc.name: Dark Ritual
mc.oracleText: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
"If there is such a thing as too much power, I have not discovered it."
--Volrath

mc.name: Darkling Stalker
mc.oracleText:
{B}: Regenerate Darkling Stalker.
{B}: Darkling Stalker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{B}: Regenerate Darkling Stalker.
{B}: Darkling Stalker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"In this dark place, yes, I am afraid of my own shadow."
--Mirri of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Dauthi Embrace
mc.oracleText: {B}{B}: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
mc.printedText: {B}{B}: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
mc.flavorText:
"The Dauthi army grows by screams and bounds."
--Lyna, Soltari emissary

mc.name: Dauthi Ghoul
mc.oracleText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever a creature with shadow is put into a graveyard from play, put a +1/+1 counter on Dauthi Ghoul.
mc.printedText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever any creature with shadow is put into any graveyard from play, put a +1/+1 counter on Dauthi Ghoul.

mc.name: Dauthi Horror
mc.oracleText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Dauthi Horror can't be blocked by white creatures.
mc.printedText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Dauthi Horror cannot be blocked by white creatures.

mc.name: Dauthi Marauder
mc.oracleText: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
mc.printedText: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
mc.flavorText:
"The Dauthi came from beneath the Ruins one night, and the darkness cast them in the best possible light."
--Soltari Tales of Life

mc.name: Dauthi Mercenary
mc.oracleText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
{1}{B}: Dauthi Mercenary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
{1}{B}: Dauthi Mercenary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The Dauthi believe they dignify murder by paying for it."
--Lyna, Soltari emissary

mc.name: Dauthi Mindripper
mc.oracleText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever Dauthi Mindripper attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, defending player discards three cards.
mc.printedText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Sacrifice Dauthi Mindripper: Defending player chooses and discards three cards. Use this ability only if Dauthi Mindripper is attacking and unblocked.

mc.name: Dauthi Slayer
mc.oracleText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Dauthi Slayer attacks each turn if able.
mc.printedText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Each turn, Dauthi Slayer attacks if able.
mc.flavorText:
"They have knives for every soul."
--Lyna, Soltari emissary

mc.name: Death Pits of Rath
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Whenever any creature is dealt damage, destroy it. That creature cannot be regenerated this turn.
mc.flavorText: As the sludge below began to shift and take shapes, Gerrard turned from the railing to Orim. "I suppose," he said, "it's a little too late for prayer, isn't it?"

mc.name: Diabolic Edict
mc.oracleText: Target player sacrifices a creature.
mc.printedText: Target player sacrifices a creature.
mc.flavorText: Greven il-Vec lifted Vhati off his feet. "The fall will give you time to think on your failure."

mc.name: Disturbed Burial
mc.oracleText:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} when you play this spell. If you do, put it into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

mc.name: Dread of Night
mc.oracleText: White creatures get -1/-1.
mc.printedText: All white creatures get -1/-1.
mc.flavorText:
"These moonless, foreign skies keep me in thrall. Dark whispers echo in the night, and I cannot resist."
--Selenia, dark angel

mc.name: Dregs of Sorrow
mc.oracleText: Destroy X target nonblack creatures. Draw X cards.
mc.printedText: Destroy X target nonblack creatures. Draw X cards.
mc.flavorText: Crovax gazed on the dead, and for one dark moment he saw a banquet.

mc.name: Endless Scream
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Endless Scream comes into play with X scream counters on it.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each scream counter on Endless Scream.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +X/+0.
mc.flavorText:
"I have made Crovax weep; now I will make him scream. The pain will not end, but will bind him to me."
--Volrath

mc.name: Enfeeblement
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
mc.flavorText: Crovax had witnessed Selenia lead the Predator to the Weatherlight. As the battle raged on deck, he felt his strength melt in the heat of her betrayal.

mc.name: Evincar's Justice
mc.oracleText:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Evincar's Justice deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} when you play this spell. If you do, put it into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Evincar's Justice deals 2 damage to each creature and player.

mc.name: Extinction
mc.oracleText: Destroy all creatures of the creature type of your choice.
mc.printedText: Destroy all creatures of any creature type of your choice.
mc.flavorText:
"I once had an entire race killed just to listen to the rattling of their dried bones as I waded through them."
--Volrath

mc.name: Fevered Convulsions
mc.oracleText: {2}{B}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
mc.printedText: {2}{B}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Tell me again why you failed to capture Gerrard, you worthless pile of spine."
--Volrath, to Greven

mc.name: Gravedigger
mc.oracleText: When Gravedigger comes into play, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: When Gravedigger comes into play, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: A full coffin is like a full coffer--both are attractive to thieves.

mc.name: Imps' Taunt
mc.oracleText:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target creature attacks this turn if able.
mc.printedText:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} when you play this spell. If you do, put it into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Target creature attacks this turn if able.

mc.name: Kezzerdrix
mc.oracleText:
First strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, if your opponents control no creatures, Kezzerdrix deals 4 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
First strike
During your upkeep, if your opponents control no creatures, Kezzerdrix deals 4 damage to you.

mc.name: Knight of Dusk
mc.oracleText: {B}{B}: Destroy target creature blocking Knight of Dusk.
mc.printedText: {B}{B}: Destroy target creature blocking Knight of Dusk.
mc.flavorText:
Fall like night upon the foe.
--Motto of the Knights of Dusk

mc.name: Leeching Licid
mc.oracleText:
{B}, {T}: Leeching Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {B} to end this effect.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Leeching Licid deals 1 damage to that player.
mc.printedText: {B}, {T}: Leeching Licid loses this ability and becomes a creature enchantment that reads "During the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Leeching Licid deals 1 damage to that player" instead of a creature. Move Leeching Licid onto target creature. You may pay {B} to end this effect.

mc.name: Living Death
mc.oracleText: Each player removes all creature cards in his or her graveyard from the game, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts into play all cards he or she removed this way.
mc.printedText: Set aside all creature cards in all graveyards. Then, put each creature that is in play into its owner's graveyard. Then, put each creature card set aside in this way into play under its owner's control.

mc.name: Maddening Imp
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{T}: Each non-Wall creature the active player controls attacks this turn if able. At end of turn, destroy each of those creatures that didn't attack this turn. Play this ability only during an opponent's turn, before attackers are declared.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{T}: All non-Wall creatures target opponent controls attack this turn if able. At end of turn, destroy each of those creatures that did not attack. Use this ability only during target opponent's turn and only before combat.

mc.name: Marsh Lurker

mc.oracleText:
When Duplicity comes into play, remove the top five cards of your library from the game face down.

At the end of your turn, discard a card.

mc.printedText:
When Duplicity comes into play, put the top five cards of your library face down on Duplicity.
During your upkeep, you may exchange all the cards in your hand for the cards on Duplicity.
At the end of your turn, choose and discard a card.
If you lose control of Duplicity, put all cards on it into owner's graveyard.

mc.printedText: Tap an untapped creature you control: Untap target basic land.
mc.flavorText:
"The land gives up little, but we are masters of persuasion."
--Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

mc.name: Eladamri, Lord of Leaves
mc.oracleText:
Other Elf creatures have forestwalk.
Other Elves have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText:
All Elves gain forestwalk. (If defending player controls any forests, those creatures are unblockable.)
Elves cannot be the target of spells or abilities.
mc.flavorText:
"We have been patient. We have planned our attack. We are ready . . . now."
--Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

mc.name: Eladamri's Vineyard
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, add {G}{G} to that player's mana pool.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's main phase, add {G}{G} to that player's mana pool.
mc.flavorText: The mushroom wine made Gerrard's head spin, and his stomach soon followed suit.

mc.name: Elven Warhounds
mc.oracleText: Whenever Elven Warhounds becomes blocked by a creature, put that creature on top of its owner's library.
mc.printedText: If Elven Warhounds is blocked by any creature, put that creature on top of owner's library.
mc.flavorText:
"If a creature is dumb enough to love you for leashing it, why would you want to follow its lead?"
--Mirri of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Elvish Fury
mc.oracleText:
Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} when you play this spell. If you do, put it into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

mc.name: Flailing Drake
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Flailing Drake blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
If Flailing Drake blocks or is blocked by any creature, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Too many choices will always distract a greedy beast.

mc.name: Frog Tongue
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When Frog Tongue comes into play, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText:
When Frog Tongue comes into play, draw a card.
Enchanted creature can block creatures with flying.
mc.flavorText: "But why can't I get one?" sniveled Squee. "All da bugs here got wings."

mc.name: Fugitive Druid
mc.oracleText: Whenever Fugitive Druid becomes the target of an Aura spell, you draw a card.
mc.printedText: Whenever any player successfully casts an enchantment spell that targets Fugitive Druid, draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"If the druids are so devoted to their trees, I will carve them coffins from their precious heartwood."
--Volrath

mc.name: Harrow
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to cast Harrow, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a land: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them into play. Shuffle your library afterwards.
mc.flavorText: Changing Rath's landscape is like tearing the scab from a wound.

mc.name: Heartwood Dryad
mc.oracleText: Heartwood Dryad can block creatures with shadow as though they didn't have shadow.
mc.printedText: Heartwood Dryad can block creatures with shadow.
mc.flavorText: To snare what lies between worlds takes the patient reach of trees.

mc.name: Heartwood Giant
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Heartwood Giant deals 2 damage to target player.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice a forest: Heartwood Giant deals 2 damage to target player.
mc.flavorText: Wind in the trees is soothing, but the same can't be said for trees on the wind.

mc.name: Heartwood Treefolk
mc.oracleText: Forestwalk
mc.printedText: Forestwalk (If defending player controls any forests, this creature is unblockable.)
mc.flavorText:
"In all my years in Llanowar I never understood where trees fit in. They are revered by elves and watered on by dogs."
--Mirri of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Horned Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Sliver creatures have trample.
mc.printedText: All Slivers gain trample.
mc.flavorText: A bristling wave of slivers broke against the Weatherlight's timbers.

mc.name: Krakilin
mc.oracleText:
Krakilin comes into play with X +1/+1 counters on it.

{1}{G}: Regenerate Krakilin.
mc.printedText:
Krakilin comes into play with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}: Regenerate Krakilin.
mc.flavorText:
"A perfect reflection of its world: brutal, fetal, and lacking truth."
--Oracle en-Vec

mc.name: Mirri's Guile
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, you may look at the top three cards of your library and put them back in any order.
mc.flavorText: Hanna was astounded. Mirri read every leaf and wisp of breeze like a book of ancient lore.

mc.name: Mongrel Pack
mc.oracleText: When Mongrel Pack is put into a graveyard from play during combat, put four 1/1 green Hound creature tokens into play.
mc.printedText: If Mongrel Pack is put into any graveyard from play during combat, put four Hound tokens into play. Treat these tokens as 1/1 green creatures.

mc.name: Muscle Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.
mc.printedText: All Slivers get +1/+1.
mc.flavorText: The air was filled with the cracks and snaps of flesh hardening as the new sliver joined the battle.

mc.name: Natural Spring
mc.oracleText: Target player gains 8 life.
mc.printedText: Target player gains 8 life.
mc.flavorText: Mirri listened intently, even as Hanna held the healing water to her lips. Would the sound of the spring drown out the elves' approach?

mc.name: Nature's Revolt
mc.oracleText: All lands are 2/2 creatures that are still lands.
mc.printedText: All lands are 2/2 creatures. (These creatures still count as lands.)
mc.flavorText:
"One day the land will don the semblance of flesh and challenge even the plowshare's blade."
--Oracle en-Vec

mc.name: Needle Storm
mc.oracleText: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.
mc.printedText: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.
mc.flavorText: The rain is driven like nails.

{G}, {T}: Nurturing Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {G} to end this effect.

mc.printedText: {G}, {T}: Nurturing Licid loses this ability and becomes a creature enchantment that reads "{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature" instead of a creature. Move Nurturing Licid onto target creature. You may pay {G} to end this effect.

mc.name: Overrun
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn. (If a creature you control would deal enough combat damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player.)
mc.printedText: All creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"You want to know your enemy? Look at your feet while you trample him."
--Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

mc.oracleText: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText: Pincher Beetles cannot be the target of spells or abilities.
mc.flavorText:
"No fair Since when does a bug get ta munch on me?"
--Squee, goblin cabin hand

mc.printedText: Search your library for a basic land card and put it into play, tapped. Shuffle your library afterwards.

mc.name: Reality Anchor
mc.oracleText:
Target creature loses shadow until end of turn.

Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Target creature loses shadow until end of turn.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"See how you like it."

mc.oracleText: Return up to X target cards from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the number of black permanents target opponent controls as you play Reap.
mc.printedText: Return any number of target cards from your graveyard to your hand. You cannot choose more cards than the number of black permanents target opponent controls.
mc.flavorText:
"Let Volrath choke on his crop of hatred."

mc.name: Recycle
mc.oracleText:
Skip your draw step.

Whenever you play a card, draw a card.

Your maximum hand size is two.
mc.printedText:
Skip your draw phase.
Whenever you play a card, draw a card.
During your discard phase, choose and discard all but two cards.

mc.name: Respite
mc.oracleText: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature.
mc.printedText: Creatures deal no combat damage this turn. Gain 1 life for each attacking creature.
mc.flavorText: "If they board us we're finished," warned Orim. Crovax nodded. "And if they don't . . . what then?"

mc.name: Root Maze
mc.oracleText: Artifacts and lands come into play tapped.
mc.printedText: All artifacts and lands come into play tapped.
mc.flavorText:
"We should step up repairs. I think the forest has plans for us."
--Crovax

mc.oracleText: Trample (If this creature would deal enough combat damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player.)
mc.printedText: Trample
mc.flavorText: As Gerrard made his escape, the wurm covered his flight by helping itself to three great mouthfuls of merfolk.

mc.oracleText: {1}{G}: Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.printedText: {1}{G}: Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Use this ability only once each turn.
mc.flavorText: If you try to sneak up on a rootwalla, you'll suddenly find yourself dealing with twice the lizard.

Scragnoth can't be countered.

mc.printedText:
Protection from blue
While Scragnoth is being cast, it cannot be countered.
mc.flavorText: It possesses no intelligence, only counter-intelligence.

mc.name: Seeker of Skybreak
mc.oracleText: {T}: Untap target creature.
mc.printedText: {T}: Untap target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"We shun them not for their dream but for their refusal to let such a noble dream die a noble death."

{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

mc.printedText: {G}{G}: Tap target creature with flying.

mc.printedText: {1}{G}: Target creature blocks Trumpeting Armodon this turn if able.

Flying

mc.printedText: {R}: Flowstone Salamander deals 1 damage to target creature blocking it.

mc.oracleText:
Flying
{R}: Flowstone Wyvern gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{R}: Flowstone Wyvern gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

"Where I come from, stone stays on the ground."

mc.printedText: Double all damage assigned to any creature or player.

mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

mc.name: Heart Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Sliver creatures have haste.
mc.printedText: All Slivers are unaffected by summoning sickness.

mc.flavorText: The first morning after acquiring her familiar, the wizard awoke with fleabites and mange.

mc.printedText: Lightning Elemental is unaffected by summoning sickness.

mc.name: Lowland Giant
mc.flavorText: "Faugh" snorted Tahngarth. "Why would it make a meal of something like you?" Squee looked relieved. "No," he continued, "you'd make a much better toothpick."

mc.name: Magmasaur

Magmasaur comes into play with five +1/+1 counters on it.
During your upkeep, remove a +1/+1 counter from Magmasaur, or sacrifice Magmasaur and it deals 1 damage for each +1/+1 counter on it to each creature without flying and each player.

mc.printedText: Mogg Conscripts cannot attack unless you have successfully cast a creature spell this turn.

"Torahn's horns They've seen us. Now, statue, you must fight to save yourself"
--Tahngarth, aboard the Predator

mc.printedText: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

First strike
